alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 05 at 9:56PM EST until March 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Maple River at Maple Rapids affecting Clinton County. .Additional rainfall combined with elevated river levels from previous snowmelt may result in flooding. For the Maple River...including Maple Rapids...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Maple River at Maple Rapids. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Expect minor flooding of County Line Road and a home along County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Maple River Maple Rapid 9.0 8.2 Sun 9 pm EST 8.6 9.2 9.5 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
